title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for an already open file in the Navigator, no action is taken and the file remains open in its current editor.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for an already open file, a new editor window should open with the file displayed.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the application and navigate to the Navigator.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file, e.g. test.xml.
4. Select the test.xml file in the Navigator.
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
6. Observe that no new editor window opens and the file remains open in its current editor.
